name: Kopemon
description:
made my first game in godot, I wanted to test out the engine by making a top down pokemon like game and this is the result, the combat is pretty boring because I didn't want to spend time on art and animation I just wanted to test out the engines features.

feel free to play it, it's pretty fun and revival is cool (I think)

credit to: https://cupnooble.itch.io/sprout-lands-asset-pack for the assets
